name: Sand Elemental

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Whirlwind
actions.description: Each creature in the elemental's space must make a DC 13 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone.

other_info: The sand elemental is a creature made of swirling sand and dust, capable of unleashing devastating whirlwinds and powerful slams.
